TopicTitle: Dark Legacy Comics (Warcraft) does a panel about KSP

Articles.Content:
Dark Legacy Comics is a World of Warcraft webcomic by Arad Kedar that has been around since 2006.

The latest comic #405 "Other Games" is about games he obviously enjoys playing.

Guess which one is first?

http://www.darklegacycomics.com/405.html
you rock!! thanks for posting this
I feel comfort that I am not yet up to the scale of Narya Nibblenose. But it amuses me to equate KSP with something gnomes would attempt to do.

I feel comfort that I am not yet up to the scale of Narya Nibblenose. But it amuses me to equate KSP with something gnomes would attempt to do.

Heck, that's nothing. You should see what happens when the Dwarf Fortress fanbase tries out KSP. Where do you think the penchant for absurdly overcomplicated and prone-to-catastrophic-failure crafts first came from in this community?
